    1. getPerson(String, String)

Interface PersonFabric

public interface PersonFabric
Interface for creating Person objects based on different input modes. The input modes determine how a Person is constructed (from mixed input, file input, or interactive input).

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Person
    getPerson(String input, String inputMode)
    Factory method to create a Person object based on the provided input string and mode.

  • Method Details

    • getPerson

      static Person getPerson(String input, String inputMode) throws RemoveOfTheNextSymbol
      Factory method to create a Person object based on the provided input string and mode. The method processes the input differently based on the mode specified:
      • "M" mode processes the input as mixed user input.
      • "F" mode processes the input as file-based input.
      • Default mode processes the input interactively.
      Parameters:
      input - the input string to create a Person object.
      inputMode - the mode that determines how the input is processed: "M" for mixed input, "F" for file input, or default for interactive input.
      Returns:
      a Person object created based on the input and mode.
      Throws:
      RemoveOfTheNextSymbol - if an unexpected or invalid symbol is found in the input.
